author: Frank Meier
description: As the name suggests, the orange of Grand Marnier heavily influences this drink. Basically a Mimosa or a Buck's Fizz (orange juice and champagne) with added oomph.
name: Grand Mimosa
recipeIngredient: 90 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine (chilled)
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: POUR half the champagne into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice), then the orange juice, orange liqueur and then the rest of the champagne
